title: The History of Hip Hop Music: The Influential Years
summary: Hip hop as a music genre can trace its origins to the 1970s when DJs would mix together different records to create unique rhythmic sounds. The term “hip hop” was not coined until the early 1980s. The 1980s marked the start of the hip-hop movement as we know it today. The early-to-mid 1990s saw the rise of the genre as a mainstream hit, with artists like Tupac Shakur and Notorious BIG becoming worldwide sensations. The internet saw a huge surge in the popularity of mixtapes, which feature artists that feature a mix of music and rapping.
